metadata.description: Professional Rust development agents with LSP integration, async patterns, and comprehensive tooling support

plugins.name: rust-agents
plugins.description: Comprehensive collection of specialized Rust development agents with Claude Code best practices. rust-analyzer LSP integration for real-time code intelligence. Handoff protocol via rust-agent-handoff skill for context sharing. Async combinator patterns for elegant concurrent code. Updated for Rust Edition 2024 and modern tooling.
